title: Exhibiting Heavenly Bodies: an Interview with Fashion Conservator Sarah Scaturro, part I
itunes:title: Exhibiting Heavenly Bodies: an Interview with Fashion Conservator Sarah Scaturro, part I
description:
This week, we go behind the scenes of the exhibition Heavenly Bodies: Fashion and the Catholic Imagination with Sarah Scaturro, head conservator at the Costume Institute at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
